history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_opp_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_zero_l,plus_opp_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_zero_l,plus_opp_r.

exceptions.tactic: assert (H1: plus (opp r) (plus r x) = plus (opp r) (plus r y)) by (rewrite H; reflexivity).
exceptions.exn: The reference r was not found in the current environment.
The LHS of plus_zero_l (plus zero _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_zero_l (plus zero _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring x, y : K H : forall x0 y0 z : ?G, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H0 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G0, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H2 : forall x0 : ?G2, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H1 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G1, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H5 : forall x0 : ?G5, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H4 : forall x0 : ?G4, plus zero x0 = x0 H3 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G3, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H8 : forall x0 : ?G8, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H7 : forall x0 : ?G7, plus zero x0 = x0 H6 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G6, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z Unable to unify "plus ?M4999 (plus ?M5000 ?M5001) = plus (plus ?M4999 ?M5000) ?M5001" with "opp (mult x y) = mult (opp x) y".

original: intros r x y H. assert (H1: plus (opp r) (plus r x) = plus (opp r) (plus r y)) by (rewrite H; reflexivity). rewrite <- plus_assoc in H1. rewrite <- plus_assoc in H1. rewrite plus_opp_r in H1. rewrite plus_zero_l in H1. rewrite plus_zero_l in H1. apply H1.
